description:
What if that's Zelda down there, and she's sending me a signal? It's a sign!
It says, `Save me, Groose. You're my only hope!`
The more I think about it, the more sure I get! It's Zelda down there, and I gotta go rescue her!

Anyhow, don't think about trying to go down there before me. I'm her hero, remember?

Ugh. I don't even know why I'm talking to you. Looking at you just makes me feel sad again.

v0.1.0.description:
First release of the Skyward Sword AP world.

For setup instructions, visit [the SS AP Setup Guide](https://github.com/Battlecats59/SS_APWorld/blob/ss/Docs/APSetup.md).

Downloads:
- SS APWorld ZIP file, containing the ss.apworld file, as well as the template YAML file, and the setup instructions.
- The ss.apworld file itself
- The template YAML file itself

v0.3.0.description:
USE AT YOUR OWN RISK

This is Pre-Alpha, there are likely still issues that can end a run. It is highly recommended to not use this in a public game, but if you do, notify all other players in the multiworld before joining.

Report any issues to the Skyward Sword thread in #future-game-design in the AP discord server.

For setup instructions, visit [the SS AP Setup Guide](https://github.com/Battlecats59/SS_APWorld/blob/ss/Docs/APSetup.md).

Downloads:

SS APWorld ZIP file, containing the ss.apworld file, as well as the template YAML file, and the setup instructions.
The ss.apworld file itself
The template YAML file itself

USE AT YOUR OWN RISK

This is Pre-Alpha, there are likely still issues that can end a run. It is highly recommended to not use this in a public game, but if you do, notify all other players in the multiworld before joining. Note that you no longer need to use your slot name as your in-game filename.

Report any issues to the Skyward Sword thread in #future-game-design in the AP discord server.

v0.4.0.description:
This is the first alpha release, you may come across some issues throughout the run. It is suggested that you notify all other players in the multiworld that you will be playing an alpha game.

Report any issues to the Skyward Sword thread in #future-game-design in the AP discord server.

For setup instructions, visit [the SS AP Setup Guide](https://github.com/Battlecats59/SSArchipelago/blob/ss/worlds/ss/docs/setup_en.md).

v0.4.0.title: v0.4.0 [Alpha]

v0.4.1.description:
## v0.4.1 [Alpha]

This is a stable release of the Skyward Sword Archipelago world. Report any issues to the Skyward Sword thread in #future-game-design in the AP discord server.

For setup instructions, visit [the SS AP Setup Guide](https://github.com/Battlecats59/SSArchipelago/blob/ss/worlds/ss/docs/setup_en.md).

[SSR Patcher build](https://nightly.link/Battlecats59/sslib/workflows/build.yaml/archipelago)

## What has changed?
- The slot data has been altered slightly to support the [SS Archipelago web tracker](https://youraveragelink.github.io/SS-Randomizer-Tracker/)
- Potential fixes for issues #2 and #3 
- Fix for offsets to the link actor (notably in Flooded Faron Woods)
- Docs updated

Downloads:

SS APWorld ZIP file, containing the ss.apworld file, as well as the template YAML file, and the setup instructions.
The ss.apworld file itself
The template YAML file itself
v0.4.1.title: v0.4.1 [Alpha]

v0.5.0.description:
## v0.5.0 [Alpha]

Report any issues to the Skyward Sword thread in #future-game-design in the AP discord server.

For setup instructions, visit [the SS AP Setup Guide](https://github.com/Battlecats59/SSArchipelago/blob/ss/worlds/ss/docs/setup_en.md).

## What has changed? (v0.5.0)
- Logic has been rewritten to support entrance randomization. There will likely be logic bugs floating around, some may not have a significant impact while some may end your run. Hence, **use at your own risk!**
- Random starting statues and random starting entrance options are now fully supported.
- The itempool generation has been changed significantly, fixing several bugs regarding starting items and item placements. Although it is unlikely, there may be bugs that were created as a result.
- Single crystals have been added as AP-recognized checks, however they will remain as single gratitude crystals for the time being. In the future, these checks may be randomized, for now they have been added to support single crystal logic.
- Code has been cleaned up.

gl, hf! -bcats

Downloads:

The zip file containing the apworld, yaml, setup guide, and patcher build (0.5.0.zip)
The ss.apworld file
The patcher build
The template YAML file
v0.5.0.title: v0.5.0 [Alpha]

v0.5.0-pre.description:
## v0.5.0 Pre-Release

WARNING: This release is not guaranteed to be stable. Use at your own risk.

Report any issues to the Skyward Sword thread in #future-game-design in the AP discord server.

For setup instructions, visit [the SS AP Setup Guide](https://github.com/Battlecats59/SSArchipelago/blob/ss/worlds/ss/docs/setup_en.md).

[SSR Patcher build](https://nightly.link/Battlecats59/sslib/workflows/build.yaml/archipelago-dev) (Different build from v0.4.0!)

## What has changed?
- Logic has been rewritten to support entrance randomization. There will likely be logic bugs floating around, some may not have a significant impact while some may end your run. Hence, **use at your own risk!**
- Random starting statues and random starting entrance options are now fully supported.
- The itempool generation has been changed significantly, fixing several bugs regarding starting items and item placements. Although it is unlikely, there may be bugs that were created as a result.
- Single crystals have been added as AP-recognized checks, however they will remain as single gratitude crystals for the time being. In the future, these checks may be randomized, for now they have been added to support single crystal logic.
- Code has been cleaned up.

## How to test these changes
- Attempt full runs and report any logic issues to the discord thread.
- Turn on the `Random Starting Statues` and `Random Starting Spawn` options.
- Generally try to play around with the options, and if you receive a generation error, report it.
- Be careful if you're planning on using this in a public multiworld.

gl, hf! -bcats

Downloads:

SS APWorld ZIP file, containing the ss.apworld file, as well as the template YAML file, and the setup instructions.
The ss.apworld file itself
The template YAML file itself
v0.5.0-pre.title: v0.5.0 Pre-Release [Alpha]

v0.5.0-pre2.description:
## v0.5.0 Pre-Release 2

WARNING: This release is not guaranteed to be stable. Use at your own risk.

Report any issues to the Skyward Sword thread in #future-game-design in the AP discord server.

For setup instructions, visit [the SS AP Setup Guide](https://github.com/Battlecats59/SSArchipelago/blob/ss/worlds/ss/docs/setup_en.md).

[SSR Patcher build](https://nightly.link/Battlecats59/sslib/workflows/build.yaml/archipelago-dev) (Different build from v0.4.0!) (Updated for Pre-Release 2)

## What has changed? (v0.5.0 Pre-Release 1)
- Logic has been rewritten to support entrance randomization. There will likely be logic bugs floating around, some may not have a significant impact while some may end your run. Hence, **use at your own risk!**
- Random starting statues and random starting entrance options are now fully supported.
- The itempool generation has been changed significantly, fixing several bugs regarding starting items and item placements. Although it is unlikely, there may be bugs that were created as a result.
- Single crystals have been added as AP-recognized checks, however they will remain as single gratitude crystals for the time being. In the future, these checks may be randomized, for now they have been added to support single crystal logic.
- Code has been cleaned up.

## What has changed? (v0.5.0 Pre-Release 2)
- Batreaux required crystal counts can now be shuffled.
- Starting with keys + keys in own dungeon generation issues have been fixed.
- The start_inventory option has been implemented.
- Archipelago chest flags for LMF and FS outer/inner maps have been fixed.
- Test fixes.

## How to test these changes
- Attempt full runs and report any logic issues to the discord thread.
- Turn on the `Random Starting Statues` and `Random Starting Spawn` options.
- Turn on the `Shuffle Batreaux Counts` reward option.
- Generally try to play around with the options, and if you receive a generation error, report it.
- Be careful if you're planning on using this in a public multiworld.

gl, hf! -bcats

Downloads:

SS APWorld ZIP file, containing the ss.apworld file, as well as the template YAML file, and the setup instructions.
The ss.apworld file itself
The template YAML file itself
v0.5.0-pre2.title: v0.5.0 Pre-Release 2 [Alpha]

v0.5.2.description:
## v0.5.2 [Alpha]

This version is only compatible with Archipelago 0.6.2 or greater!!

Report any issues to the Skyward Sword thread in #future-game-design in the AP discord server.

For setup instructions, visit [the SS AP Setup Guide](https://github.com/Battlecats59/SSArchipelago/blob/ss/worlds/ss/docs/setup_en.md).

## What has changed? (v0.5.2)
- Several fixes for generation errors ( by Harmjan387 - see [#24](https://github.com/Battlecats59/SSArchipelago/pull/24), [#25](https://github.com/Battlecats59/SSArchipelago/pull/25), and [#26](https://github.com/Battlecats59/SSArchipelago/pull/26) )
- Completion condition fix ( by LelouBil - see [#22](https://github.com/Battlecats59/SSArchipelago/pull/22) )
- Shuffled Batreaux Counts ( by Battlecats59 - see [#19](https://github.com/Battlecats59/SSArchipelago/pull/19) )
  - Options including vanilla (5-80), half (2-40), random (1-80), random-high (30-80), and random-low (1-50)
    - Batreaux check names are changed to contain the required amount of crystals. Kukiel will also appear in Batreaux's house, telling you what the shuffled crystal counts are.
  - Batreaux progression option is now a range 0-7, which will determine how many of Batreaux's rewards can possibly contain progression items.
    - If set to 0, no Batreaux rewards can contain progression items.
    - If set to 7, all Batreaux rewards could contain progression items.
    - If set to any number (n) between 0 and 7, then the first (n) rewards could contain progression items, and the highest rewards will not contain progression items.
- Print client messages in-game ( by YourAverageLink - see [#21](https://github.com/Battlecats59/SSArchipelago/pull/21) )
  - A cosmetic option has been added to the patcher to allow client messages in-game to be turned on or off before iso generation.
  - If turned on, client messages will be printed in-game in the bottom left corner of the screen.
- Fix for incorrect hints ( by Harmjan387 - see [issue #22](https://github.com/Battlecats59/SS_APWorld/issues/22) and [PR #28](https://github.com/Battlecats59/SSArchipelago/pull/28) )
- Separate option for Lanayru Caves Small Key - moved away from dungeon small keys
  - New option has choices "Start With", "Caves", "Lanayru", and "Anywhere". All options will ensure that you will not be locked out of sand sea / lanayru desert / and so on, no matter where your starting statue or entrance is.
- APWorld is now auto-generated by a github workflow, like the patcher build is.
- Added an icon to the Skyward Sword client on the Archipelago launcher
- Fix for APPlayerContainer issue in AP 0.6.2
- Update to AP 0.6.2

## What has changed? (v0.5.1)
- Fixes for issues during seed generation: #20 
- Logic fixes
- Update to AP 0.6.1

## What has changed? (v0.5.0)
- Logic has been rewritten to support entrance randomization. There will likely be logic bugs floating around, some may not have a significant impact while some may end your run. Hence, **use at your own risk!**
- Random starting statues and random starting entrance options are now fully supported.
- The itempool generation has been changed significantly, fixing several bugs regarding starting items and item placements. Although it is unlikely, there may be bugs that were created as a result.
- Single crystals have been added as AP-recognized checks, however they will remain as single gratitude crystals for the time being. In the future, these checks may be randomized, for now they have been added to support single crystal logic.
- Code has been cleaned up.

gl, hf! -bcats

Downloads:

The zip file containing the apworld, YAML, and setup guides
The ss.apworld file
The patcher build
The template YAML file
v0.5.2.title: v0.5.2

v0.5.2-pre1.description:
## v0.5.2 Pre-Release 1 [Alpha]

THIS VERSION REQUIRES ARCHIPELAGO 0.6.2 OR GREATER TO WORK PROPERLY!!

Report any issues to the Skyward Sword thread in #future-game-design in the AP discord server.

For setup instructions, visit [the SS AP Setup Guide](https://github.com/Battlecats59/SSArchipelago/blob/ss/worlds/ss/docs/setup_en.md).

## What has changed? (v0.5.2 Pre-Release 1)
- Several fixes for generation errors ( by Harmjan387 - see [#24](https://github.com/Battlecats59/SSArchipelago/pull/24), [#25](https://github.com/Battlecats59/SSArchipelago/pull/25), and [#26](https://github.com/Battlecats59/SSArchipelago/pull/26) )
- Completion condition fix ( by LelouBil - see [#22](https://github.com/Battlecats59/SSArchipelago/pull/22) )
- Shuffled Batreaux Counts ( by Battlecats59 - see [#19](https://github.com/Battlecats59/SSArchipelago/pull/19) )
  - Options including vanilla (5-80), half (2-40), random (1-80), random-high (30-80), and random-low (1-50)
    - Batreaux check names are changed to contain the required amount of crystals. Kukiel will also appear in Batreaux's house, telling you what the shuffled crystal counts are.
  - Batreaux progression option is now a range 0-7, which will determine how many of Batreaux's rewards can possibly contain progression items.
    - If set to 0, no Batreaux rewards can contain progression items.
    - If set to 7, all Batreaux rewards could contain progression items.
    - If set to any number (n) between 0 and 7, then the first (n) rewards could contain progression items, and the highest rewards will not contain progression items.
- Print client messages in-game ( by YourAverageLink - see [#21](https://github.com/Battlecats59/SSArchipelago/pull/21) )
  - A cosmetic option has been added to the patcher to allow client messages in-game to be turned on or off before iso generation.
  - If turned on, client messages will be printed in-game in the bottom left corner of the screen.
- Added an icon to the Skyward Sword client on the Archipelago launcher
- Fix for APPlayerContainer issue in AP 0.6.2
- Update to AP 0.6.2

## What has changed? (v0.5.1)
- Fixes for issues during seed generation: #20 
- Logic fixes
- Update to AP 0.6.1

## What has changed? (v0.5.0)
- Logic has been rewritten to support entrance randomization. There will likely be logic bugs floating around, some may not have a significant impact while some may end your run. Hence, **use at your own risk!**
- Random starting statues and random starting entrance options are now fully supported.
- The itempool generation has been changed significantly, fixing several bugs regarding starting items and item placements. Although it is unlikely, there may be bugs that were created as a result.
- Single crystals have been added as AP-recognized checks, however they will remain as single gratitude crystals for the time being. In the future, these checks may be randomized, for now they have been added to support single crystal logic.
- Code has been cleaned up.

gl, hf! -bcats

Downloads:

The zip file containing the apworld, yaml, setup guide, and patcher build (0.5.2-pre1.zip)
The ss.apworld file
The patcher build
The template YAML file
v0.5.2-pre1.title: v0.5.2 Pre-Release 1 [Alpha]

v0.5.2-pre2.description:
## v0.5.2 Pre-Release 2 [Alpha]

THIS VERSION REQUIRES ARCHIPELAGO 0.6.2 OR GREATER TO WORK PROPERLY!!

Report any issues to the Skyward Sword thread in #future-game-design in the AP discord server.

For setup instructions, visit [the SS AP Setup Guide](https://github.com/Battlecats59/SSArchipelago/blob/ss/worlds/ss/docs/setup_en.md).

## What has changed? (v0.5.2 Pre-Release 2)
- Fix for incorrect hints ( by Harmjan387 - see [issue #22](https://github.com/Battlecats59/SS_APWorld/issues/22) and [PR #28](https://github.com/Battlecats59/SSArchipelago/pull/28) )
- Separate option for Lanayru Caves Small Key - moved away from dungeon small keys
  - New option has choices "Start With", "Caves", "Lanayru", and "Anywhere". All options will ensure that you will not be locked out of sand sea / lanayru desert / and so on, no matter where your starting statue or entrance is.
- APWorld is now auto-generated by a github workflow, like the patcher build is.

## What has changed? (v0.5.2 Pre-Release 1)
- Several fixes for generation errors ( by Harmjan387 - see [#24](https://github.com/Battlecats59/SSArchipelago/pull/24), [#25](https://github.com/Battlecats59/SSArchipelago/pull/25), and [#26](https://github.com/Battlecats59/SSArchipelago/pull/26) )
- Completion condition fix ( by LelouBil - see [#22](https://github.com/Battlecats59/SSArchipelago/pull/22) )
- Shuffled Batreaux Counts ( by Battlecats59 - see [#19](https://github.com/Battlecats59/SSArchipelago/pull/19) )
  - Options including vanilla (5-80), half (2-40), random (1-80), random-high (30-80), and random-low (1-50)
    - Batreaux check names are changed to contain the required amount of crystals. Kukiel will also appear in Batreaux's house, telling you what the shuffled crystal counts are.
  - Batreaux progression option is now a range 0-7, which will determine how many of Batreaux's rewards can possibly contain progression items.
    - If set to 0, no Batreaux rewards can contain progression items.
    - If set to 7, all Batreaux rewards could contain progression items.
    - If set to any number (n) between 0 and 7, then the first (n) rewards could contain progression items, and the highest rewards will not contain progression items.
- Print client messages in-game ( by YourAverageLink - see [#21](https://github.com/Battlecats59/SSArchipelago/pull/21) )
  - A cosmetic option has been added to the patcher to allow client messages in-game to be turned on or off before iso generation.
  - If turned on, client messages will be printed in-game in the bottom left corner of the screen.
- Added an icon to the Skyward Sword client on the Archipelago launcher
- Fix for APPlayerContainer issue in AP 0.6.2
- Update to AP 0.6.2

## What has changed? (v0.5.1)
- Fixes for issues during seed generation: #20 
- Logic fixes
- Update to AP 0.6.1

## What has changed? (v0.5.0)
- Logic has been rewritten to support entrance randomization. There will likely be logic bugs floating around, some may not have a significant impact while some may end your run. Hence, **use at your own risk!**
- Random starting statues and random starting entrance options are now fully supported.
- The itempool generation has been changed significantly, fixing several bugs regarding starting items and item placements. Although it is unlikely, there may be bugs that were created as a result.
- Single crystals have been added as AP-recognized checks, however they will remain as single gratitude crystals for the time being. In the future, these checks may be randomized, for now they have been added to support single crystal logic.
- Code has been cleaned up.

gl, hf! -bcats

Downloads:

The zip file containing the apworld, YAML, and setup guides
The ss.apworld file
The patcher build
The template YAML file
v0.5.2-pre2.title: v0.5.2 Pre-Release 2

v0.5.3.description:
## v0.5.3 [Alpha]

This version is only compatible with Archipelago 0.6.2 or greater!!

Report any issues to the Skyward Sword thread in #future-game-design in the AP discord server.

For setup instructions, visit [the SS AP Setup Guide](https://github.com/Battlecats59/SSArchipelago/blob/ss/worlds/ss/docs/setup_en.md).

## What has changed? (v0.5.3)
- Added a client command to toggle deathlink mid-game ( by Harmjan 387 - see [#29](https://github.com/Battlecats59/SSArchipelago/pull/29) )
- Fixed plando items breaking generation ( by Harmjan 387 - see [#29](https://github.com/Battlecats59/SSArchipelago/pull/29) )

## What has changed? (v0.5.2)
- Several fixes for generation errors ( by Harmjan387 - see [#24](https://github.com/Battlecats59/SSArchipelago/pull/24), [#25](https://github.com/Battlecats59/SSArchipelago/pull/25), and [#26](https://github.com/Battlecats59/SSArchipelago/pull/26) )

    - If set to 0, no Batreaux rewards can contain progression items.
    - If set to 7, all Batreaux rewards could contain progression items.
    - If set to any number (n) between 0 and 7, then the first (n) rewards could contain progression items, and the highest rewards will not contain progression items.
- Print client messages in-game ( by YourAverageLink - see [#21](https://github.com/Battlecats59/SSArchipelago/pull/21) )
  - A cosmetic option has been added to the patcher to allow client messages in-game to be turned on or off before iso generation.
  - If turned on, client messages will be printed in-game in the bottom left corner of the screen.
- Fix for incorrect hints ( by Harmjan387 - see [issue #22](https://github.com/Battlecats59/SS_APWorld/issues/22) and [PR #28](https://github.com/Battlecats59/SSArchipelago/pull/28) )
- Separate option for Lanayru Caves Small Key - moved away from dungeon small keys
  - New option has choices "Start With", "Caves", "Lanayru", and "Anywhere". All options will ensure that you will not be locked out of sand sea / lanayru desert / and so on, no matter where your starting statue or entrance is.
- APWorld is now auto-generated by a github workflow, like the patcher build is.
- Added an icon to the Skyward Sword client on the Archipelago launcher
- Fix for APPlayerContainer issue in AP 0.6.2
- Update to AP 0.6.2

## What has changed? (v0.5.1)
- Fixes for issues during seed generation: #20 
- Logic fixes
- Update to AP 0.6.1

## What has changed? (v0.5.0)
- Logic has been rewritten to support entrance randomization. There will likely be logic bugs floating around, some may not have a significant impact while some may end your run. Hence, **use at your own risk!**
- Random starting statues and random starting entrance options are now fully supported.
- The itempool generation has been changed significantly, fixing several bugs regarding starting items and item placements. Although it is unlikely, there may be bugs that were created as a result.
- Single crystals have been added as AP-recognized checks, however they will remain as single gratitude crystals for the time being. In the future, these checks may be randomized, for now they have been added to support single crystal logic.
- Code has been cleaned up.

The zip file containing the apworld, YAML, and setup guides
The ss.apworld file
The patcher build
The template YAML file

v0.5.4.description:
## v0.5.4 [Alpha]

This version is only compatible with Archipelago 0.6.5 or greater!!

Report any issues to the Skyward Sword thread in #future-game-design in the AP discord server.

For setup instructions, visit [the SS AP Setup Guide](https://github.com/Battlecats59/SSArchipelago/blob/ss/worlds/ss/docs/setup_en.md).

## What has changed? (v0.5.4)
- WII CONSOLE SUPPORT! ( by YourAverageLink - see [#27](https://github.com/battlecats59/SSArchipelago/pull/27) )
  - For more info, see [setting up your wii console](https://github.com/YourAverageLink/SSArchipelago/blob/console-socket/worlds/ss/docs/setup_en.md#setting-up-your-client-wii-console) in the SSAP Setup Guide
- Fixed an issue with generation failure in AP 0.6.5 ( by Harmjan387 - see [#31](https://github.com/Battlecats59/SSArchipelago/pull/31) )
- Fixed an issue with the lumpy pumpkin chandelier send flag ( by Harmjan387 - see [#32](https://github.com/Battlecats59/SSArchipelago/pull/32) )
- Fixed an issue with death link on console ( by YourAverageLink - see [#34](https://github.com/Battlecats59/SSArchipelago/pull/34) )
- Added Goddess cube autotracking (by Harmjan387 and YourAverageLink - see [#33](https://github.com/Battlecats59/SSArchipelago/pull/33) )
- Added console auto-reconnect ( by YourAverageLink - see [#37](https://github.com/Battlecats59/SSArchipelago/pull/37) )

## What has changed? (v0.5.3)
- Added a client command to toggle deathlink mid-game ( by Harmjan 387 - see [#29](https://github.com/Battlecats59/SSArchipelago/pull/29) )
- Fixed plando items breaking generation ( by Harmjan 387 - see [#29](https://github.com/Battlecats59/SSArchipelago/pull/29) )

## What has changed? (v0.5.2)
- Several fixes for generation errors ( by Harmjan387 - see [#24](https://github.com/Battlecats59/SSArchipelago/pull/24), [#25](https://github.com/Battlecats59/SSArchipelago/pull/25), and [#26](https://github.com/Battlecats59/SSArchipelago/pull/26) )
- Completion condition fix ( by LelouBil - see [#22](https://github.com/Battlecats59/SSArchipelago/pull/22) )
- Shuffled Batreaux Counts ( by Battlecats59 - see [#19](https://github.com/Battlecats59/SSArchipelago/pull/19) )
  - Options including vanilla (5-80), half (2-40), random (1-80), random-high (30-80), and random-low (1-50)
    - Batreaux check names are changed to contain the required amount of crystals. Kukiel will also appear in Batreaux's house, telling you what the shuffled crystal counts are.
  - Batreaux progression option is now a range 0-7, which will determine how many of Batreaux's rewards can possibly contain progression items.
    - If set to 0, no Batreaux rewards can contain progression items.
    - If set to 7, all Batreaux rewards could contain progression items.
    - If set to any number (n) between 0 and 7, then the first (n) rewards could contain progression items, and the highest rewards will not contain progression items.
- Print client messages in-game ( by YourAverageLink - see [#21](https://github.com/Battlecats59/SSArchipelago/pull/21) )
  - A cosmetic option has been added to the patcher to allow client messages in-game to be turned on or off before iso generation.
  - If turned on, client messages will be printed in-game in the bottom left corner of the screen.
- Fix for incorrect hints ( by Harmjan387 - see [issue #22](https://github.com/Battlecats59/SS_APWorld/issues/22) and [PR #28](https://github.com/Battlecats59/SSArchipelago/pull/28) )
- Separate option for Lanayru Caves Small Key - moved away from dungeon small keys
  - New option has choices "Start With", "Caves", "Lanayru", and "Anywhere". All options will ensure that you will not be locked out of sand sea / lanayru desert / and so on, no matter where your starting statue or entrance is.
- APWorld is now auto-generated by a github workflow, like the patcher build is.
- Added an icon to the Skyward Sword client on the Archipelago launcher
- Fix for APPlayerContainer issue in AP 0.6.2
- Update to AP 0.6.2

## What has changed? (v0.5.1)
- Fixes for issues during seed generation: #20 
- Logic fixes
- Update to AP 0.6.1

## What has changed? (v0.5.0)
- Logic has been rewritten to support entrance randomization. There will likely be logic bugs floating around, some may not have a significant impact while some may end your run. Hence, **use at your own risk!**
- Random starting statues and random starting entrance options are now fully supported.
- The itempool generation has been changed significantly, fixing several bugs regarding starting items and item placements. Although it is unlikely, there may be bugs that were created as a result.
- Single crystals have been added as AP-recognized checks, however they will remain as single gratitude crystals for the time being. In the future, these checks may be randomized, for now they have been added to support single crystal logic.
- Code has been cleaned up.

gl, hf! -bcats

### Downloads:

[RECOMMENDED] The zip file containing the apworld, YAML, and setup guides (ss_apworld-v0.5.4.zip)
[RECOMMENDED] The patcher build (SS_APPatcher-v0.5.4.zip)

The apworld file (ss.apworld)
The template YAML file (Skyward.Sword.yaml)
*The above two files are contained in the first zip, and do not need to be downloaded if you download the apworld zip*

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Battlecats59/SS_APWorld/compare/v0.5.3...v0.5.4
v0.5.4.title: v0.5.4

v0.5.5.description:
## v0.5.5 [Alpha]

This version is only compatible with Archipelago 0.6.5 or greater!!

Report any issues to the Skyward Sword channel under custom worlds in the AP discord server.

For setup instructions, visit [the SS AP Setup Guide](https://github.com/Battlecats59/SSArchipelago/blob/ss/worlds/ss/docs/setup_en.md).

## What has changed? (v0.5.5)
- Logic revamp, no longer using eval() function, which brings us closer to core eligibility
- Updated setup guide - new tutorial video by bcats
- Fixed client connection bug regarding hints ( by Harmjan387 - see [#42](https://github.com/Battlecats59/SSArchipelago/pull/42) )
- Fixed logic bug regarding Eldin starting statues ( by bcats - see [this commit](https://github.com/Battlecats59/SSArchipelago/commit/52d7a057c3b80d911d79de70e4e6d53681d65ff9) )

## What has changed? (v0.5.4)
- WII CONSOLE SUPPORT! ( by YourAverageLink - see [#27](https://github.com/battlecats59/SSArchipelago/pull/27) )
  - For more info, see [setting up your wii console](https://github.com/YourAverageLink/SSArchipelago/blob/console-socket/worlds/ss/docs/setup_en.md#setting-up-your-client-wii-console) in the SSAP Setup Guide
- Fixed an issue with generation failure in AP 0.6.5 ( by Harmjan387 - see [#31](https://github.com/Battlecats59/SSArchipelago/pull/31) )
- Fixed an issue with the lumpy pumpkin chandelier send flag ( by Harmjan387 - see [#32](https://github.com/Battlecats59/SSArchipelago/pull/32) )
- Fixed an issue with death link on console ( by YourAverageLink - see [#34](https://github.com/Battlecats59/SSArchipelago/pull/34) )
- Added Goddess cube autotracking (by Harmjan387 and YourAverageLink - see [#33](https://github.com/Battlecats59/SSArchipelago/pull/33) )
- Added console auto-reconnect ( by YourAverageLink - see [#37](https://github.com/Battlecats59/SSArchipelago/pull/37) )

## What has changed? (v0.5.3)
- Added a client command to toggle deathlink mid-game ( by Harmjan 387 - see [#29](https://github.com/Battlecats59/SSArchipelago/pull/29) )
- Fixed plando items breaking generation ( by Harmjan 387 - see [#29](https://github.com/Battlecats59/SSArchipelago/pull/29) )

## What has changed? (v0.5.2)
- Several fixes for generation errors ( by Harmjan387 - see [#24](https://github.com/Battlecats59/SSArchipelago/pull/24), [#25](https://github.com/Battlecats59/SSArchipelago/pull/25), and [#26](https://github.com/Battlecats59/SSArchipelago/pull/26) )
- Completion condition fix ( by LelouBil - see [#22](https://github.com/Battlecats59/SSArchipelago/pull/22) )
- Shuffled Batreaux Counts ( by Battlecats59 - see [#19](https://github.com/Battlecats59/SSArchipelago/pull/19) )
  - Options including vanilla (5-80), half (2-40), random (1-80), random-high (30-80), and random-low (1-50)
    - Batreaux check names are changed to contain the required amount of crystals. Kukiel will also appear in Batreaux's house, telling you what the shuffled crystal counts are.
  - Batreaux progression option is now a range 0-7, which will determine how many of Batreaux's rewards can possibly contain progression items.
    - If set to 0, no Batreaux rewards can contain progression items.
    - If set to 7, all Batreaux rewards could contain progression items.
    - If set to any number (n) between 0 and 7, then the first (n) rewards could contain progression items, and the highest rewards will not contain progression items.
- Print client messages in-game ( by YourAverageLink - see [#21](https://github.com/Battlecats59/SSArchipelago/pull/21) )
  - A cosmetic option has been added to the patcher to allow client messages in-game to be turned on or off before iso generation.
  - If turned on, client messages will be printed in-game in the bottom left corner of the screen.
- Fix for incorrect hints ( by Harmjan387 - see [issue #22](https://github.com/Battlecats59/SS_APWorld/issues/22) and [PR #28](https://github.com/Battlecats59/SSArchipelago/pull/28) )
- Separate option for Lanayru Caves Small Key - moved away from dungeon small keys
  - New option has choices "Start With", "Caves", "Lanayru", and "Anywhere". All options will ensure that you will not be locked out of sand sea / lanayru desert / and so on, no matter where your starting statue or entrance is.
- APWorld is now auto-generated by a github workflow, like the patcher build is.
- Added an icon to the Skyward Sword client on the Archipelago launcher
- Fix for APPlayerContainer issue in AP 0.6.2
- Update to AP 0.6.2

## What has changed? (v0.5.1)
- Fixes for issues during seed generation: #20 
- Logic fixes
- Update to AP 0.6.1

## What has changed? (v0.5.0)
- Logic has been rewritten to support entrance randomization. There will likely be logic bugs floating around, some may not have a significant impact while some may end your run. Hence, **use at your own risk!**
- Random starting statues and random starting entrance options are now fully supported.
- The itempool generation has been changed significantly, fixing several bugs regarding starting items and item placements. Although it is unlikely, there may be bugs that were created as a result.
- Single crystals have been added as AP-recognized checks, however they will remain as single gratitude crystals for the time being. In the future, these checks may be randomized, for now they have been added to support single crystal logic.
- Code has been cleaned up.

gl, hf! -bcats

### Downloads:

[RECOMMENDED] The zip file containing the apworld, YAML, and setup guides (ss_apworld-v0.5.5.zip)
[RECOMMENDED] The patcher build (SS_APPatcher-v0.5.5.zip)

The apworld file (ss.apworld)
The template YAML file (Skyward.Sword.yaml)
*The above two files are contained in the first zip, and do not need to be downloaded if you download the apworld zip*
